ebi.name: Ebi
ebi.description: Ebi are a popular tempura ingredient that can be found on virtually all tempura dishes.

sakana.name: Sakana
sakana.description: Sakana are small fillets or whole small fish which are made into tempura pieces.

kabocha.name: Kabocha
kabocha.description: Kabocha are Japanese pumpkin with a thin, typically dark green skin and orange flesh.
